Workplace wellness challenges: Organize regular wellness challenges, such as step competitions, plank challenges, or push-up contests. Provide prizes for the winners to encourage participation. Confidence score: 0.9/1

On-site fitness equipment: Install on-site fitness equipment, such as treadmills, stationary bikes, or resistance bands. Employees can use these during breaks or lunch hours. Confidence score: 0.8/1
